dateOfBirth.missingDay: Your date of birth must include a day
dateOfBirth.missingMonth: Your date of birth must include a month
dateOfBirth.missingYear: Your date of birth must include a year
dateOfBirth.missingDayAndMonth: Your date of birth must include a day and month
dateOfBirth.missingDayAndYear: Your date of birth must include a day and year
dateOfBirth.missingMonthAndYear: Your date of birth must include a month and year
dateOfBirth.custom: You must be at least 18 years old
